name: 超级混沌合集 SUPER CHAOS FUNPACK 1100-IN-1
name_original: 超级混沌合集 SUPER CHAOS FUNPACK 1100-IN-1
description:
多么有趣！

CHAOCLYPSE制作的游戏合集，1100款游戏，保证给你带来无数小时的娱乐！

RADICAL!

A game collection by Chaoclypse, guaranteed to bring you countless hour(s) of entertainment!

DISCLAIMER: 1089 of the 1100 games may or may not be duplicates.

========================================

All of the music for the multicart menu was done by the very talented Vav... Go hire him!!

Additional information and credits can be found in the accompanying README.txt. Have fun!!
